scripts.deploy-to-beta: ruby build.rb && publisssh build spacewarps.org/beta2 && trash ./build
scripts.deploy-to-demo: ruby build.rb && publisssh build zooniverse-demo/spacewarps-z8e && trash ./build
scripts.deploy-to-production: ruby build.rb && publisssh build spacewarps.org && trash ./build
scripts.deploy-to-testing: ruby build.rb && publisssh build zooniverse-static/spacewarps.org/swapr && trash ./build
